Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lafayette/83rd
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 83rd, Holland, 87th and Lafayette: due to, street blockage near Lafayette/83rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 83rd, Holland, 87th and Lafayette: due to, street blockage near Lafayette/83rd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between Damen and Western (Forest Park Branch)
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Damen and Western (Forest Park Branch) due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Damen and Western (Forest Park Branch) due to signal problems.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between O'Hare and Damen (O'Hare Branch), and,
  • between Western (Forest Park Branch) and Forest Park, only.

Shuttle buses have been resquested to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
